frontMatter.title: Navigate benefit applications
frontMatter.description: Follow this pattern to help users navigate complex benefit applications through structured phases.
frontMatter.intro: Use this pattern to help Veterans navigate complex benefit applications through four structured phases - Eligibility, How to apply, Apply now, and After you apply.

when_to_use.value: **Complex benefit applications.** When policies and regulations around benefits are complex and users need guidance.
**Eligibility assessment.** When users need help determining if they're eligible.
**Application guidance.** When users need to understand what to provide and what to expect.

design_principles.value: **Four-phase structure.** Organize into Eligibility, How to apply, Apply now, and After you apply.
**Present common scenarios.** Present the most common scenario using featured content.
**Scale complexity.** Build from simple to complex information.

examples.title: Eligibility page
examples.description: Page helping users understand if they qualify for a benefit.

examples.title: How to apply page
examples.description: Page explaining preparation and application methods.

examples.title: Apply now page
examples.description: Entry point to the application with process map.

examples.title: After you apply page
examples.description: Page explaining what to expect after submission.

how_to_build.intro: Structure benefit applications into four distinct phases.

steps.value: **Eligibility:** Use title 'Eligibility for [Benefit Name]'. Present common scenarios with featured content.
**How to Apply:** Use title 'How to apply for [Benefit Name]'. Include multiple application methods.
**Apply Now:** Show subway map with four steps - Prepare, Apply, VA review, VA decision.
**After You Apply:** Use title 'After you apply for [Benefit Name]'. Communicate processing timeframes.
Include sign-in messaging for authenticated/unauthenticated users.
Include OMB information and need-help footer on Apply Now page.

accessibility.value: Screen reader users cannot visually scan for below-the-fold content.
Important information should not be placed solely below key call-to-action elements.
Ensure all navigation elements are keyboard accessible.
